name: Kashyap Brothers
overview:
Establishment in the year 1982, we, “Kashyap Brothers”, are one of the reputed organizations of the industry successfully engaged in manufacturing and supplying a wide range of CNC Solutions, Oven, Servo Voltage Stabilizers, Electroplating Rectifier, Drives, Welding Rectifiers and Control Transformer and Panel Board.

Our Team: Engineers Quality analysts Sales & marketing experts Administrative staff R & D professionals

Infrastructure: We are blessed with a sophisticated infrastructure facility, which sprawls over a vast area of land and aids us to carry out all the organizational activities of our organization in a streamlined manner. Furthermore, in order to maintain this facility in a disciplined and systematic order, we have divided our infrastructure into individual departments such as manufacturing, quality testing, warehousing and packing, administrative unit.

Quality Assurance: Since our inception, our organization is aimed towards serving our clients with a quality-approved and a flawless range of products and thus pay utmost importance to the quality aspect of the product offered by us. All the products offered by us are manufactured using quality-approved raw-material sourced from the authorized vendors of the industry.

Client Satisfaction: Kashyap Brothers, is a reputed organization of the industry successfully engaged in manufacturing and supplying a wide array of CNC Solutions, Oven, Servo Voltage Stabilizers, Electroplating Rectifier, Drives, Welding Rectifiers and Control Transformer and Panel Board.
